    "file_path": "h2q_project/evolution_system.py",
    "content": "import random

class EvolutionSystem:
    def __init__(self, initial_code):
        self.current_code = initial_code

    def evolve(self):
        # Simulate code generation errors that led to recent task failures (785, 781, 728, 716, 688).
        # Apply random mutations to the code.
        mutated_code = self.current_code
        if random.random() < 0.1:  # Introduce errors 10% of the time
            # Simulate an error in code generation
            mutated_code = ""
        else:
            # Simulate mutation by adding/removing lines or changing tokens.
            lines = self.current_code.splitlines()
            if len(lines) > 0:
                if random.random() < 0.3:  # Introduce delete line error 30% of the time when lines exist.
                    del lines[random.randint(0, len(lines) - 1)]
                elif random.random() < 0.3: # Introduce duplicate line error 30% of the time when lines exist
                    lines.append(lines[random.randint(0, len(lines) - 1)])
                else:
                    index_to_mutate = random.randint(0, len(lines) - 1)
                    line = lines[index_to_mutate]
                    if len(line) > 0:
                        char_index = random.randint(0, len(line) - 1)
                        new_char = chr(random.randint(32, 126)) # printable ascii
                        line = line[:char_index] + new_char + line[char_index+1:]
                        lines[index_to_mutate] = line
            mutated_code = "\n".join(lines)


        self.current_code = mutated_code
        return self.current_code

    def get_current_code(self):
        return self.current_code"
  }
